title: The Hollywood Reporter and Spotify Celebrate Golden Globe Nominees With Amy Poehler, Odessa A’zion and ‘Heated Rivalry’ Breakouts
summary: The Nominees Night event featured musical moments from Chaka Khan, John Legend, 'Sinners' star Miles Caton and Mark Ronson, and Quinta Brunson, Natasha Lyonne and Mel Robbins among the guests.

title: Connor Storrie Doesn’t Need Help Staying Sane Amid ‘Heated Rivalry’ Craze, He’s Playing it Cool
summary: The Hollywood Reporter caught up with the Texas native at back-to-back events on Wednesday and asked how he’s dealing with the crush of newfound fame. (Hint: Deleting Instagram from his iPhone.)
